title: Tasted by the Polar Bear Warriors
description: Tania is a horny climate scientist taking ice samples in a frozen tundra when she suddenly gets caught in the middle of two lustful magical warriors that reveal to her a secret, fantastical world hidden from humanity filled with wonder and bliss, penetrating her reality more deeply than anything science could explain.  ***WARNING*** THIS STORY HAS EXPLICIT, HARDCORE MENAGE MFF SEX. Those looking for a tame romance erotica should avoid buying my book.  ***All characters in this book are of adult, consenting age. There is no snuff, underage, or non-consenting sex in this book.***
author: Tallia Ravejoy
